## IAssignmentLogger interface

Implement this interface log variation assignments to your data warehouse.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAssignmentLogger 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [logAssignment(assignment)](./node-server-sdk.iassignmentlogger.logassignment.md) | Invoked when a subject is assigned to an experiment variation. |
